data.text: @GuyNohra My best friend knew she was a fake when she saw her wearing hijab to comfort victims after the mosque shootings in 2019. Such an obvious “for the cameras” move.
@MadameKempe That prime minister should be voted out of office asap. Compare her stupid policies to Sweden and see who was right.

Also, if NZ does better in terms of mortality, let’s remember that they do it on the backs of the rest of the world. No vaccine could have been approved without testing in an environment of widespread cases. They closed borders and let others take the hit. No heroism there.
